title: Why is it that banned users names will never be available for cleanup?
body:
Theres a name i really want but cant get because the user was perma banned 

While i know yall cant personally unlock a name for me i just would like to know the reasoning behind banned users names not being available for cleanup like a normal inactive player (24 months after lvl 30)

replies.body: Pretty sure it has to do with the behavior that was tied to that name. If someone ends up being overly toxic, their summoner name could be associated with that kind of behavior. Then if someone were to get that name later on, they might be attacked based on what other people did under that name.

id risk it Q~Q

Its been almost 3 years xD
